==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|げん|そ|yomi=o|sort=けんそ'}}

===Etymology===
{{compound|元|lang=ja|tr1=[[gen]]|t1=[[element]]|素|tr=[[so]]|t2=element|sort=けんそ'}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|げんそ|acc=a|y=ko}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|げんそ}}

# {{lb|ja|chemistry|sort=けんそ'}} [[element]], [[chemical element]]

====Alternative forms====
* [[原素]]

====Derived terms====
* [[希元素]] (''kigenso''): rare element
* [[希土類元素]] (''kidorui genso''): rare earth elements
* [[金属元素]] (''kinzoku genso''): metallic element
* [[人工元素]] (''jinkō genso''): synthetic element
* [[遷移元素]] (''sen'i genso''): transition element
* [[窒素族元素]] (''chissozoku genso''): nitrogen group
* [[超ウラン元素]] (''chōuran-genso''): transuranium element
* [[超重元素]] (''chōjū-genso''): transuranium element
* [[同位元素]] (''dōi genso''): isotope
* [[白金族元素]] (''hakkinzoku genso''): platinum group metals
* [[ハロゲン族元素]] (''harogenzoku genso''): halogen family elements
* [[非金属元素]] (''hikinzoku genso''): nonmetallic element
* [[微量元素]] (''biryō genso''): trace element
* [[放射性元素]] (''hōshasei genso''): radioactive element
* [[四大元素]] (''yondai-genso''): the four classical chemical elements (fire, earth, air and water)
* [[元素記号]] (''genso kigō''): chemical symbol
* [[元素周期律]] (''genso shūkiritsu''): periodic table of the elements
* [[元素周期律表]] (''genso shūkiritsuhyō''): periodic law
